name: Unfathomable Abyss
description:
This game was made for the Unreal Engine August 2015 game jam. The theme was "Thrown in at the deep end".

A deep sea adventure/collect-a-thon, where you play as a weird alien creature who needs to avoid other spooky fishes and gather up all the glowing balls.

This is an old project reuploaded to itch.io to have all my game jam games conveniently in one place. There are no plans to continue development.
